title: Provided that the limit of maximum area of 2500 sq
clause_text: Provided that the limit of maximum area of 2500 sq. m shall not apply for the development under this Regulation. The LOS area shall be counted in 1/3 open space required as per regulation 3(c) above.
section: 33 (22) Regulation for Exhibition-cum-Convention Centers in MCGM Area

source_pdf.text_snippet: Provided that the limit of maximum area of 2500 sq. m shall not apply for the development under this Regulation.
